titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael / Mälkǝʾa Mikaʾel "Image of Michael"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 4ra-87va) I-1) Introduction (fol. 4ra-7va) I-2) Homily by Timothy (Dämatewos), Patriarch [of Alexandria] for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 7va-15va); miracle (fols. 15va-16vb); commemorative notice (fols. 16vb-17rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 17rb) I-3) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs the Orthodox for the 12th of Taḫśaś [Miyazya] (fols. 17rb-22ra); miracle (fol. 22ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 23ra-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 23va) I-4) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Ṭǝrr [Taḫśaś] (fols. 23vb-29va); miracle (fol. 29va-30ra); commemorative notice (fol. 30rb-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 30va) I-5) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Yäkkatit (fols. 30va-34ra); miracle (fol. 34ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 35ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 35rb) I-6) Homily by Yoḥannǝs [Severus], Metropolitan [Patriarch] of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit (fols. 35rb-50ra); miracle (fols. 50ra-51rb); commemorative notice (fol. 51rb-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 51va) I-7) Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for the 12th of Miyazya [Ṭǝrr] (fols. 51va-57ra); miracle (fols. 57ra-58va); commemorative notice (fol. 58va-vb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 58vb-59ra) I-8) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Ethiopia for Gǝnbot (fols. 59ra-60va); miracle (fols. 60va-61vb); commemorative notice (fols. 61vb-62ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 62ra-rb) I-9) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Aksum (ʾAkwǝsum) for Säne (fols. 62rb-67va); miracle (fols. 67vb-68vb); commemorative notice (fols. 68vb-69va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 69va) I-10) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs for Ḥamle (fols. 69va-73vb); miracle (fols. 73vb-74va); commemorative notice (fols. 74va-75ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 75ra) I-11) Homily by an anonymous author for Näḥase (fols. 75ra-78ra); miracle (fol. 78ra-vb); commemorative notice (fols. 78vb-79ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 79ra) I-12) Homily by an anonymous author for Mäskäräm (fols. 79ra-81vb); miracle (fols. 81vb-82ra); commemorative notice (fol. 82rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 82rb-va) I-13) Homily by an anonymous author for Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 82va-86va); miracle (fol. 86va-vb); commemorative notice (fols. 86vb-87va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 87va) I-14) Account of the eschatological war between Archangel Michael and Satan including a description of Satan's physical appearance (fols. 87vb-88vb) II) Mälkǝʾa Mikaʾel "Image of Michael" (fols. 88vb-92vb) (cp. ChRep no. 119)
Colophon.

copyists.copyist: Priest Dästa Gäbrä Maryam from Lǝgat is mentioned as the scribe in the colophon. He is the same scribe who wrote Mss. FBM-012 and UM-008.

donors.donor: The following persons are mentioned in the supplication formulas (inserted in the main hand and in a secondary hand): Gäbrä Krǝstos and his wife Wälättä Haymanot, Täsfa Mikaʾel, Wälättä Mikaʾel, Täsfa Maryam, Täklä Maryam.

dcomments.dcomment: According to the colophon, the Ms. was written in 1972/73 A.D.

txstates.txstate: Holes or tears amended on fols. 63, 82. One bifolio (fols. 46/49) is of smaller size.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; leather inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: triple line fillet, interlaced line fillet, double circle, double crescent with eye, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 1/fols. 1r-3v) – I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – ፪II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፫III(8/fols. 20r-27v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 28r-35v) – ፭V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – ፮VI(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 44r-51v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 60r-67v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 68r-75v) – ፲X(8/fols. 76r-83v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 84r-91v) – ፲፪XII(4/fols. 92r-95v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist, names of the donor and other persons; groups of lines on the incipit page; incipit of all sections; incipit or the initial word of subsections; the word sälam "salutation"; the word bä-ʾǝntä "about" on fol. 62ra; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (e.g., fols. 16vb, 35vb, 50ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 7va, 22ra, 30ra, 75rb)

colophon.tran: This book was completed by the hand of the scribe priest Dästa Gäbrä Maryam from the land of Lǝgat in the year of mercy 1965. [vac.] He has purchased it for 85 Bǝrr and donated it to the church of Mary ˁAddi Qiyaḥto. The one who stole it or erased (its text) shall be excommunicated by the authority of Peter and Paul. For ever and ever. Amen and amen. Let it be, let it be.
colophon.det: The year of mercy 1965 corresponds to 1972/73 A.D. The space for the name of the commissioner has been left unfilled (?).

extras.extra: - Part of Text III is written in compressed script: fols. 90va-92vb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Simply decorated quire marks are written in the centre of the upper margin on fols. 12r: ፪, 20r: ፫, 28r: ፬, 36r: ፭, 44r: ፮, 52r: ፯, 59r: ፰, 68r: ፱, 76r: ፲, 84r: ፲፩, 92r: ፲፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written within decorative frames in the upper margin, in the main hand: ዘኅዳር: fol. 7va ዘታሕሣሥ: fol. 17rb ዘጥር: fol. 23vb ዘየካቲት: fol. 30va ዘመጋቢት: fol. 35rb ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 51va ዘግንቦት: fol. 59ra ዘሰኔ: fol. 62rb ዘሐምሌ: fol. 69va ዘነሐሴ: fol. 75ra ዘመስከረም: fol. 79ra ዘጥቅምት: fol. 82va ዘኅዳር፡ ዘይትነበብ: fol. 87vb.

frames.frame: Fol. 4r (incipit page Text I-1): elaborate coloured (red, green, black) ornamental band with one central and two lateral pendants reaching the bottom of the page; interlaces. Fol. 23va (explicit of Text I-3): coloured (red, black) ornamental band; interlaces. Fol. 88vb (incipit of Text III): coloured (red, black) ornamental band; interlaces and floral motifs.
